hero.title: Data to enrich your Business
hero.subtitle: KNOTS is a data science company providing solutions to address the needs of your business and to help you to reach your goals.

mission.title: This is our mission
mission.subtitle: Whatever it might be
mission.body:
Leverage **agile frameworks** to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to *corporate strategy* foster [collaborative](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1613353948535-0f50344f69f7?ixid=MXwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHw%3D&ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=934&q=80) thinking to further the overall value proposition. 

Organically grow the holistic world view of disruptive innovation via workplace diversity and empowerment.

value.title: This is our value
value.subtitle: Whatever that might be
value.body: Bring to the table win-win survival strategies to ensure proactive domination. At the end of the day, going forward, a new normal that has evolved from generation X is on the runway heading towards a streamlined cloud solution. User generated content in real-time will have multiple touchpoints for offshoring.
